ComicInfo.Summary: Skin Trade: When Zealot and Voodoo squabble during training, Marlowe sends them on vacation together to work out their differences. The pair end up invading the country of Yurgova, trying to rescue Zealot's long lost daughter from Destine.
ComicInfo.Title: Skin Trade
